verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5627><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> the right hand <S%G1188><s%> of him that sat <S%G2521><s%> <S%G5740><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the throne <S%G2362><s%> a book <S%G975><s%> written <S%G1125><s%> <S%G5772><s%> within <S%G2081><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> on the backside <S%G3693><s%>, sealed <S%G2696><s%> <S%G5772><s%> with seven <S%G2033><s%> seals <S%G4973><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5627><s%> a strong <S%G2478><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> proclaiming <S%G2784><s%> <S%G5723><s%> with a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%>, Who <S%G5101><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> worthy <S%G514><s%> to open <S%G455><s%> <S%G5658><s%> the book <S%G975><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> to loose <S%G3089><s%> <S%G5658><s%> the seals <S%G4973><s%> thereof <S%G846><s%>?

And <S%G2532><s%> no man <S%G3762><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>, nor <S%G3761><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> earth <S%G1093><s%>, neither <S%G3761><s%> under <S%G5270><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%>, was able <S%G1410><s%> <S%G5711><s%> to open <S%G455><s%> <S%G5658><s%> the book <S%G975><s%>, neither <S%G3761><s%> to look <S%G991><s%> <S%G5721><s%> thereon <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> wept <S%G2799><s%> <S%G5707><s%> much <S%G4183><s%>, because <S%G3754><s%> no man <S%G3762><s%> was found <S%G2147><s%> <S%G5681><s%> worthy <S%G514><s%> to open <S%G455><s%> <S%G5658><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to read <S%G314><s%> <S%G5629><s%> the book <S%G975><s%>, neither <S%G3777><s%> to look <S%G991><s%> <S%G5721><s%> thereon <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the elders <S%G4245><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5719><s%> unto me <S%G3427><s%>, Weep <S%G2799><s%> <S%G5720><s%> not <S%G3361><s%>: behold <S%G2400><s%> <S%G5628><s%>, the Lion <S%G3023><s%> of <S%G5607><s%> <S%G5752><s%> <S%G1537><s%> the tribe <S%G5443><s%> of Juda <S%G2455><s%>, the Root <S%G4491><s%> of David <S%G1138><s%>, hath prevailed <S%G3528><s%> <S%G5656><s%> to open <S%G455><s%> <S%G5658><s%> the book <S%G975><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> to loose <S%G3089><s%> <S%G5658><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> seals <S%G4973><s%> thereof <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I beheld <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5627><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%>, lo <S%G2400><s%> <S%G5628><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> the midst <S%G3319><s%> of the throne <S%G2362><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of the four <S%G5064><s%> beasts <S%G2226><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the midst <S%G3319><s%> of the elders <S%G4245><s%>, stood <S%G2476><s%> <S%G5761><s%> a Lamb <S%G721><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> it had been slain <S%G4969><s%> <S%G5772><s%>, having <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5723><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> shofars <S%G2768><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> eyes <S%G3788><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> <S%G5748><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> Spirits <S%G4151><s%> of 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> sent forth <S%G649><s%> <S%G5772><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he came <S%G2064><s%> <S%G5627><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> took <S%G2983><s%> <S%G5758><s%> the book <S%G975><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> the right hand <S%G1188><s%> of him that sat <S%G2521><s%> <S%G5740><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> the throne <S%G2362><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> he had taken <S%G2983><s%> <S%G5627><s%> the book <S%G975><s%>, the four <S%G5064><s%> beasts <S%G2226><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> four <S%G5064><s%> and twenty <S%G1501><s%> elders <S%G4245><s%> fell down <S%G4098><s%> <S%G5627><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> the Lamb <S%G721><s%>, having <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5723><s%> every one of them <S%G1538><s%> harps <S%G2788><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> golden <S%G5552><s%> vials <S%G5357><s%> full <S%G1073><s%> <S%G5723><s%> of odours <S%G2368><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> <S%G5748><s%> the prayers <S%G4335><s%> of saints <S%G40><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> they sung <S%G103><s%> <S%G5719><s%> a new <S%G2537><s%> song <S%G5603><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5723><s%>, Thou art <S%G1488><s%> <S%G5748><s%> worthy <S%G514><s%> to take <S%G2983><s%> <S%G5629><s%> the book <S%G975><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> to open <S%G455><s%> <S%G5658><s%> the seals <S%G4973><s%> thereof <S%G846><s%>: for <S%G3754><s%> thou wast slain <S%G4969><s%> <S%G5648><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> hast redeemed <S%G59><s%> <S%G5656><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> to 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> blood <S%G129><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> kindred <S%G5443><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> tongue <S%G1100><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> people <S%G2992><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> nation <S%G1484><s%>;

And <S%G2532><s%> hast made <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5656><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> unto our <S%G2257><s%> 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> kings <S%G935><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Kohanim <S%G2409><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> we shall reign <S%G936><s%> <S%G5692><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I beheld <S%G1492><s%> <S%G5627><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> I heard <S%G191><s%> <S%G5656><s%> the voice <S%G5456><s%> of many <S%G4183><s%> angels <S%G32><s%> round about <S%G2943><s%> the throne <S%G2362><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the beasts <S%G2226><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the elders <S%G4245><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> the number <S%G706><s%> of them <S%G846><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> ten thousand <S%G3461><s%> times ten thousand <S%G3461><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> thousands <S%G5505><s%> of thousands <S%G5505><s%>;

Saying <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5723><s%> with a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%>, Worthy <S%G514><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> the Lamb <S%G721><s%> that was slain <S%G4969><s%> <S%G5772><s%> to receive <S%G2983><s%> <S%G5629><s%> power <S%G1411><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> riches <S%G4149><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> wisdom <S%G4678><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> strength <S%G2479><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> honour <S%G5092><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> b'rakhah <S%G2129><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> creature <S%G2938><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> under <S%G5270><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> such as <S%G3739><s%> are <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> the sea <S%G2281><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> that are in <S%G1722><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, heard I <S%G191><s%> <S%G5656><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5723><s%>, Blessing <S%G2129><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> honour <S%G5092><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> power <S%G2904><s%>, be unto him that sitteth <S%G2521><s%> <S%G5740><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> the throne <S%G2362><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> unto the Lamb <S%G721><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> ever <S%G165><s%> and ever <S%G165><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> the four <S%G5064><s%> beasts <S%G2226><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5707><s%>, Amen <S%G281><s%>. And <S%G2532><s%> the four <S%G5064><s%> and twenty <S%G1501><s%> elders <S%G4245><s%> fell down <S%G4098><s%> <S%G5627><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> worshipped <S%G4352><s%> <S%G5656><s%> him that liveth <S%G2198><s%> <S%G5723><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> ever <S%G165><s%> and ever <S%G165><s%>.
